amendatorysection.catchline: Interstate county bridges; revenue bonds; election; when dispensed with.
amendatorysection.para: No election and no vote of electors shall be required upon the question of acquiring or constructing any bridges or issuing revenue bonds as authorized by section 39-860, for the acquisition or construction of any bridge, if the governing body of the county shall determine by vote of a majority of its members to dispense with such election or vote of electors as to such question.
